talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Hmm... <sp:5:0:0>How am I supposed to activate
this construct?
talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I've been examining this construct
for so long,<sp:5:0:0> but I just can't seem to
get it working...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>Well, given that you showed up
down here, it can't hurt to ask...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Do you know how to activate constructs?
talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>First I'll rough you up a little...<sp:5:0:0>then I'll
find a way to make you talk.
talk_1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> What am I doing here?<sp:5:0:0> Isn't it
obvious?! I'm examining this construct!<sp:0:4:0>So quit bothering me!
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>How can I get this thing moving?<sp:5:0:0> I don't
even know where to begin.
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>I've got to get my hands on the treasure
somehow... <sp:5:0:0>Before that guy shows up...
talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Don't talk to me while I'm trying to think!<sp:5:0:0>
Once I figure out how to activate the
thing, you'll know.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now scram!
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You do?! <sp:5:0:0>I thought a famous hero like
you might!<sp:5:1:0> In fact, I was sure of it!
talk_1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Well, no matter. <sp:5:0:0>I'll have all the time
I need to examine it after I defeat you.
talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>I'm still investigating this thing!<sp:5:0:0>
So make yourself scarce!
talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Liar! <sp:5:0:0>You just think I'm suspicious and
don't want to tell me!
talk_1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>As you can clearly see, I'm trying to
examine this construct. Emphasis on
TRYING. So don't bother me!
talk_1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Ah, forgive me for raising my voice.<sp:5:0:0> I was
just so caught up in my investigation.
talk_1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm trying to investigate this construct.<sp:5:0:0>
I get that you're curious, but...I'd prefer
you didn't interrupt me.
